title: ☑️ Dependency Dashboard
body:
This issue lists Renovate updates and detected dependencies. Read the [Dependency Dashboard](https://docs.renovatebot.com/key-concepts/dashboard/) docs to learn more.
[View this repository on the Mend.io Web Portal](https://developer.mend.io/github/PFCCLab/ci-bypass). ## Pending Approval These branches will be created by Renovate only once you click their checkbox below. - [ ] ⬆️ deps: Update dependency @github/local-action to v4 ## Detected dependencies

.github/workflows/check-dist.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `pnpm/action-setup v4` - `actions/setup-node v4` - `actions/upload-artifact v4`
.github/workflows/ci.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `pnpm/action-setup v4` - `actions/setup-node v4`
.github/workflows/codeql-analysis.yml - `actions/checkout v4` - `github/codeql-action v3` - `github/codeql-action v3` - `github/codeql-action v3`
.github/workflows/example-workflow.yml - `actions/checkout v4`

package.json - `@actions/core ^1.11.1` - `@actions/github ^6.0.0` - `@github/local-action ^3.1.4` - `@types/node ^22.14.1` - `prettier ^3.5.3` - `rolldown 1.0.0-beta.24` - `tsx ^4.19.3` - `typescript ^5.8.3` - `vitest ^3.1.1` - `node >=21` - `pnpm 10.12.4`
